properties.body:
WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
S/V SHANGRILA DISABLED AND ADRIFT IN
35-36.6N 073-51.8W AT 030852Z DEC. VESSELS IN
VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO RCC NORFOLK,
INMARSAT-C: 430370670, TELEX: 127775,
PHONE: 757 398 6231, FAX: 757 398 6392,
E-MAIL: D05-SMB-D5CC@USCG.MIL.
